attributes.action: Government to support the cost of gluten free foods for diagnosed coeliacs
attributes.additional_details: For those who have been diagnosed with coeliac disease should get help from the GPs and government towards the cost of foods. Prices are disproportionate to the normal foods in supermarkets and people are taking advantage.
attributes.background: The price of gluten free foods is extortionate and unfair. The government, in support with the GP surgeries, need to help with the cost of foods for those diagnosed coeliacs. This should be discussed to help those who don’t choose to live this way.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Fund vouchers for people with coeliac disease" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/735949
